name: places/ChIJ07YcIkNZwokRDooCa3Seqsg
adrFormatAddress: 1976 2nd Ave, New York, NY 10029, USA

originalText.text: Tested positive for Covid and told me to take Motrin.

text.text: Tested positive for Covid and told me to take Motrin.

originalText.text:
I have been to Zip Care 3 times because it is 2 minutes from my apartment.  Unfortunately, I cannot give this location more stars.  Instead of getting the results within the hour, it took them 3 days to email my rapid test results to me.  My teenage daughter also went, and it took them another week to email the results. This morning I needed a rapid test before getting a surgery so I stopped in again (they were not busy at all) I got a rapid test and chose to wait for my results this time.  The attendant administering the test, walked silently into the room, made no eye contact, and after prepping the test mumbled, “lift up your head.”  She completed the test and walked out.

I did speak to her respectfully about her lack of professionalism and patient care manner.  Not sure if she really took it to heart but at least she knows. I also had t ask the three chatty attendants at the desk if my test was ready. Not even thinking of checking on it. This place needs new management.  I will return to City MD- they’re great.

originalText.text: Gosh what can I say…I’ve been to this clinic a couple times in the past and it was always an eh experience but assuming they got some new receptionist…that was a good call! I think she’s new because Ive never seen her there before but Cristal is a dream Gosh she makes everything go by so smoothly and she’s so understanding. Literally if you come here Please ask for Cristal, you won’t have any issues! I can assure you on that! Seriously!!!

originalText.text: I’ve had great experiences here but there is a older white male doctor who has been extremely judgmental and passive aggressive towards me and my roommate when attending. He was not kind or hospitable. He had an extreme attitude and wouldn’t even hear me out. I’ve never felt more uncomfortable and insecure in a doctors office. He wasn’t helpful and told me he couldn’t help my situation, when I’ve been to this exact location with the same issue and they’ve helped every time. I will not be returning to this location unless Craig is the doctor on duty.

originalText.text: this location definitely deserves 5 stars rating . I went in for a covid test and vaccination. Everyone there was super friendly and fast with everything. there was this one nurse assistant I believe her name is Jada, she was beyond patient with everything even  with it being super busy that day . i most definitely recommend this place
